import { PopoverFooter } from '@looker/components'
import { Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'
import storyFooterClose from '!!raw-loader!./FooterClose'
import storyFooterWithChildren from '!!raw-loader!./FooterWithChildren'

<Meta component={PopoverFooter} title="Docs/PopoverFooter" />

# PopoverFooter

`PopoverFooter` can be attached to the bottom of Popover.

This component contains a dismissal button with the default text of "Done", which can be customized using the `closeButton` prop.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

<Editor code={storyFooterClose} />

## Footer with children

Use this to render additional contents inside the footer.

<Editor code={storyFooterWithChildren} />

## Props

<ArgsTable of={PopoverFooter} exclude={excludedProps} />
